oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Novel octanuclear copper(I) metallomacrocycles and their transformation into hexanuclear 2-dimensional grids of copper(I) coordination polymers containing cyclodiphosphazanes, [(mu-(NBuP)-Bu-t)(2)(NC4H8X)(2)](X=NMe,O)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SURESH, D
BALAKRISHNA, MS
MAGUE, JT
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: structural-characterization
complexes
ligands
spectroscopy
chemistry
crystal
halide
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Novel octanuclear copper(I) macrocyclic complexes and hexanuclear 2-dimensional grid-like polymers containing [P(mu-NR)](2) scaffold in which the anionic moieties are trapped inside the cationic macrocyclic cavities are reported.
